item.description:
Location: Newton Cultural Center
Saturday, April 21, 10am-7pm
10-11am
Larisa Dyan, Museum of Russian Icons Storytelling and Russian dolls demonstration (10am in English; 10:30am in Russian)
11am
Russian Folk Dancing
Noon
Margaret Dyer Coleman, Russian American Cultural Center of Boston: Talk and display of McCausland-Woronko collection of unique Russian handicrafts
3pm
Russian Filmmakers: Discussion and screenings with Yury Norshtein, "Hedgehog in the Fog" cartoon, Mikhail Brusilovsky and Mariya Gershteyn
5pm
Russian Tea & book signing with Russian Authors Date: 4/21/2012
Time: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Cultural Festival
